layers.definition: Mutual resonance where the overlap of fields produces more energy/coherence than either alone.
layers.poetic: Two roots entwine in hidden soil; life flows where neither could endure alone.
layers.equation: Î”E_total = E(AâˆªB) - [E(A) + E(B)]; classify symbiosis if Î”E_total > 0.
layers.algorithm: Given nodes A,B: estimate E(A), E(B), E(AâˆªB) via task performance or stability; compute Î”E_total; if > threshold, tag 'symbiotic'.
